name: ZAKESTA
description:
５段階パワーアップする通常ショットと３段階パワーアップするサブウェポンで全５面を戦うシューテュングです。 クリアしたステージは残機無限で練習できる他、ゲームクリア後はサウンドテストモードも選べるようになります。

＊BGMはd-elf.com様の曲を使用しており１面・最終面はヴォーカロイドによる歌有BGMを選択できます。
※画像のインストカードはSugar Noeさんからの頂き物です。

ZAKESTA is a shoot 'em up that challenges players to blast their way through a total of five stages, with a main shot that can be powered up 5 levels and an array of sub-weapons that can be powered up 3 levels. The game also includes a stage select feature that allows players to practice previously-cleared stages with infinite lives, as well as a sound test that unlocks upon clearing the game.

*The BGM was sourced from d-elf.com, and the first and final stage tunes feature sung vocaloid melodies that can be toggled on or off.

※The how-to-play card featured in the banner image was generously provided by Sugar Noe.
